snippet: Twitter executives and their advisers took pains to say that Dick Costolo’s departure as C.E.O. was not tied to an external event, but rumors persist.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Twitter executives and their advisers took pains to say that Dick Costolo’s departure as C.E.O. was not tied to an external event, but rumors persist.

headline.main: Costolo Exit at Twitter Kick-Starts Deal Speculation
